Name: Application Insights - Annotate Release
Description: Marks a release point in Application Insights.

Parameters.Name: ApiKey
Parameters.Label: Api Key
Parameters.HelpText: The API Key to use to configure the Application Insights application.

Parameters.Name: ReleaseName
Parameters.Label: Release Name
Parameters.HelpText: The release name. Typically bound to #{Octopus.Release.Number}

Parameters.Name: ReleaseProperties
Parameters.Label: Release Properties
Parameters.HelpText:
List of key/value pairs separated by a new-line. For example:

```
ReleaseDescription = Release with annotation
TriggerBy = John Doe
```
